      Methods in org.vertx.java.core.net that return NetClientBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetClientBase NetClientBase.setTrustAll(boolean trustAll)
      If trustAll is set to true then the client will trust ALL server certifactes and will not attempt to authenticate them against it's local client trust store.
